text: Otávio D'Ávila Bandeira (born 4 June 1963) is a Brazilian rower. He competed in the men's coxed four event at the 1992 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1963 births Category:Living people Category:Brazilian male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of Brazil Category:Rowers at the 1992 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Porto Alegre
title: Otávio Bandeira
